Text:
Thanks, whoever you are.

I was just thinking about trying to run the old GTA on my rig.
it would be nice if you would seed this..
they are genuine.. but you also get these via live when you try to play an old xbox game... as long as the game is supported..

laptop shut down...seeding now. Live wouldn't install hese files on my drive (my fault or not, I don't know). As soon as I put them in partition 2 live would download the compatablitiy update and play the original game. Before that I would just get an error message saying the game could not be downloaded.
